name: Sadad Payment for WooCommerce
author: Sadad Payment Team

sections.description:
Introduction

Pioneers of financial technology, Sadad provides high-tech, yet easy to use financial solutions that are revolutionizing Kuwait’s financial industry. To serve our customers better, we continue to innovate and constantly adapt to the ever changing technological world. Our first-rate customer service along with our state of the art digital experience, allows us to constantly elevate customer satisfaction!

Supported Payments

Sadad supports local KNET, VISA/MASTER, and Apple Pay.
sections.installation:
To use this plugin, Your account has to be qualified to use our API, please log in to your account and find the Client Key/Secret ID under your profile page, If it’s not showing active please contact support@sadadpay.net to enable it.
After that, follow the installation steps in this link.
sections.changelog:
1.0.2 (2024-3-12)

Support WooCommerce checkout blocks

See changelog.txt for older logs.

short_description: Here at Sadad, you are the priority and we want to help you facilitate your online payments with a simple and straightforward payment process.
